title: Chlorophyte Dye
summaries: Chlorophyte Dye is a Hardmode dye that is obtained by trading Strange Plants found in the world to the Dye Trader. It can only be obtained after defeating any mechanical boss. It makes items show three colors: black, green, or neon green. The location the colors are placed appears to be based on saturation.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC50 SC
